title: How to Trust God With Our Brokenness
description:
Sadie speaks with Ellie Holcomb about how God often uses our brokenness to show us we are truly loved by Him. They also talk about being changed through the prayer and the power of being in God’s presence. Because of Jesus, our suffering never gets the final word, and you will never regret trusting Him.
-
